## Description {#details}

Add prototypes to prototypes-less functions.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> has strict function prototype checking so we need functions declarations to match the call sites. Clang treats prototype-less functions as varargs (foo(...)) which happens to work on existing platforms but doesn&#39;t under <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a>. This pass will find all the call sites of each prototype-less function, ensure they agree, and then set the signature on the function declaration accordingly.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find calls of this function, looking through bitcasts.</span></CodeLine>
